Key Match Events: Patrick Dorgu scored a minute after coming off the bench for his debut
Nico Elvedi received a red card after a VAR review
Granit Xhaka received a second yellow card and was dismissed
Post-Match Reflections: Danish captain Pierre Emil Hojbjerg commented on the team's resilience after coming back from 0-0
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at the Parken Stadium in Copenhagen, Denmark
Others: The match was a Nations League A Group 4 clash
Denmark is now top of the group after a scoreless draw between Spain and Serbia
